name: a stickman journey
description:
use ZQSD to move around

Z to jump

S to interact with stuff around the game world

note: All of the game(including art, sounds,code) was made by myself, yours, truly AMEANBOI

the demo clearly needs a lot more polish and content but i don't have the time for it so i decided to publish it (Classic EA move tbh)

for more info or possible collaborations leave a comment!
